## EditorRules.ReferenceJsonEditorRule.editProperty() method

Evaluates a property for reference expansion.

**Signature:**

```typescript
editProperty(key: string, value: JsonValue, state: JsonEditorState): DetailedResult<JsonObject, JsonPropertyEditFailureReason>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The key of the property to be considered. |
|  value | [JsonValue](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md) | The [value](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md) of the property to be considered. |
|  state | JsonEditorState | The  for the object being edited. |

**Returns:**

DetailedResult&lt;[JsonObject](./ts-json.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->, JsonPropertyEditFailureReason&gt;

If the reference is successful, returns Success with a JsonObject to be flattened and merged into the current object. Fails with detail 'inapplicable' for non-reference keys or with detail 'error' if an error occurs.
